title: Lag Issues/ Ping Spikes since switching to Xfinity
body: Although I am aware of there being multiple older threads addressing this very same issue, I have yet to find a solution even now. I have done some research and this seems to be a recurring issue with Comcast customers that also play League. These random ping spikes make it incredibly tough to play League at my full capacity as these ping spikes happen quite frequently. I am hoping that maybe someone that has found a way to resolve this issue will arise to help me or perhaps a Riot employee can assist me.

replies.body:
Rineyy provided a great reply that touches the basic steps to take. Additionally, I wanted to mention that irregular latency (ping) and spiking is often caused by ISP routing changes or problems with your local or ISP's network hardware. The connection guide Rineyy linked will take you through the basic troubleshooting levels of how to solve this issue. If you still see issues after running the steps in the guide, I definitely agree that you would benefit from reaching out to our tech experts [through a ticket. ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Let me know if you have any questions.

The servers were upgraded yesterday, which can be a possible cause in the increase but you stated this has been happening for the past few days so that probably isn't the case for you.

Firstly; [Troubleshoot your connectivity issues.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/su16_keyart_1920x1080_0.jpg?itok=6nj8mHjj

If you continue to experience an increased ping;


Drop a line with Riot’s [Technical Support Centre](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=34190)


* The primary category has already been chosen. 


* For the secondary category, select **I’m lagging more than normal**
